name: Kiran Rawat
intro:
In today's innovative culture, data is a massive part in deciding the company's future. I am a Data Scientist with more than one year of experience performing data-driven solutions to increase effectiveness, accuracy, and service of internal data processing.

I have completed my Masters in Computing Science (Big Data) at Simon Fraser University. I did my Data Science co-op from SSR Mining, where I practically got to apply my academia knowledge in a mining world to generate machine learning and data-driven solutions at a massive scale.

My peers describe me as a confident person with excellent presentation skills. I have a knack for solving puzzles and understanding complex problems. I like to have a positive outlook on my work and strive for perfection in my daily tasks.

I have graduated in June 2020 and looking for opportunities in Data Science and Data Engineering domain. I want to utilize my skills as a Software Engineer and Data Scientist to create a progressive environment.

Please feel free to contact me. I would love to hear from you. My contact details can be found out on this website.

projects.title: Understanding Global Poverty Using Visualization, Simon Fraser University
projects.about: Developed a visualization dashboard by utilizing visualization principles to understand the global poverty and various factors related to it.

projects.title: Predicting Stable Portfolios using Machine Learning and Deep Learning
projects.about: Analyzed effect of sentiments of SEC filings on stock prices of S&P500 companies and predicted a stable portfolio based on sentiment scores and OHLC data using neural networks.

projects.title: NYC Taxi Analysis, Simon Fraser University
projects.about: Performed ETL using PySpark and analyzed the dataset to provide the insights on how the taxi vendors in NYC can improve their business. Visualized the results using Kibana framework.
